Articles.Content:
<p><img alt="image" src="http://media.tumblr.com/029295276005d87285b9343b52aa5b9c/tumblr_inline_mvn8ydY5Td1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>In this holiday edition of <strong>The Daily Kerbal</strong>, we are very pleased to share some of the cool stuff that our users made for Halloween. From the official forums, Reddit, Twitter and all over the place, here are some of our favorite Kerbal pictures.</p>

<p><a href="http://imgur.com/a/fcesU"><a href="http://imgur.com/a/fcesU">http://imgur.com/a/fcesU</a></a></p>

I like all the thumbs ups, it's very Kerbal space program.

"Everything is AOK."
